title: ok this is just bullshit.
body: getting real sick of hackers in my games now. first a 0 armor pen fiora makes mince meat of my rammus. then im vs an ekko with NO BOOTS outrunning everyone with ease. only way i can catch him is by slowing him. with me having upgraded boots as well. and building FULL MR BUILD. STILL BURSTING ME DOWN. i call that hacking. hope those fuckers i reported get perma banned im getting seriously sick and tired of teh hackers.

Uninstall.

Your tilting hard...
Fiora killed YOUR FULL AP RAMMUS,
And Ekko moves fast. Its his thing.
Ikr XD

> 
> I think I know what happened now.

and how wasent my build full mr? i built the ad item LAST. i have every fuckign mr item besides GA

Hacking will never change somebody's numbers in game. It can't help you deal more or take less damage.

Typically, the cheating you will see is called scripting, which is where programs take actions for you in the game.

Edit: Fiora has true damage in her kit, which penetrates armor. Ekko's passive gives him a movespeed boost after he hits an enemy three times.

Fiora's passive has true damage, causing her to be a counter to rammus "w" especially with her ultimate, that gives her 4 passive procs in a row. Ekko's passive gives 80 percent movement speed at higher levels of his passive, causing an ekko to sometimes not need boots(the passive also makes slow effects on ekko less strong).

you never said that, I made a suggestion of what could have happend, she furthermore would also do a lot of damage since i now looked up the match and saw you build ap rammus. Also considering the fiora ended the game 18/2 she might have just been fed.

As for her being a hacker, no hacker that could hack till the degree of damage amplification would be in bronze. She was simply fed and she beat you purely on basic stats. If she could damage hack she would also actually only build health as it would prevent her from dying. 

Your whole assumption that she is hacking based on the fact that I guessed partially wrong of your 5 rules of text.

Don't just insult people because you made a post with barely any information in it that keeps people guessing, it makes you look really bad.


edit: as for you now probably saying runic echoes is a default build on rammus, it is objectively not
http://www.leagueofgraphs.com/champions/items/rammus 99.9 percent of all rammus players build cinderhulk
someone needs to learn what the enemy champion does before doing dumb threads like this one... also you either show pics or it didn't happen and you are talking out of your ass

and i always feel so honored when they call me a scripter... that fact i can sometimes get games i do well enough that people think i script just makes me feel proud.. even if i do have 1500 games on the champ..
Fiora doesn't need pen...

Yeah I've got hackers too, every Singed player just kills me without ever getting close. Seems like every time I get behind one I get hurt. 

You don't understand how the champs work is all.
kid doesn't know what is hacking

Fiora craps on tanks.  That's her thing.

Ekko is fast.  That's his thing.

That isn't hacking.  That's design.
I think that is where lethality comes in , they will shit on fiora and then rammus can shit on lethality builders
Learn to build better! You know that it will do? To put it in your words, it will allow you to "hack" the game legally, just like the players you reported :)
